title: Costa Club: Free Drink for New Members
description: Join Costa Club today and enjoy a free handcrafted drink on your next visit when you download the app.
description_zh: 今天加入 Costa Club，下载应用即可在下次到店时免费领取一杯手工饮品。

title: Boots No7 Free Skin Care Consultation & Samples
title_zh: Boots No7 免费护肤咨询与试用装
description: Book a No7 skin consultation in store and receive tailored advice plus free samples to take home.
description_zh: 到门店预约 No7 护肤咨询，享受专属建议并带走免费试用装。

title: Greggs Rewards: Free Hot Drink
description: Register for Greggs Rewards in the app and claim a free hot drink of your choice.
description_zh: 在 Greggs 应用注册 Rewards 会员即可领取一杯自选免费热饮。

title: IKEA Family: Free Hot Drink Monday to Friday
title_zh: IKEA Family：周一至周五免费热饮
description: Scan your IKEA Family card in the restaurant to enjoy a free tea or filter coffee every weekday.
description_zh: 在宜家餐厅刷 IKEA Family 会员卡，即可在每个工作日享受一杯免费茶或滤泡咖啡。

title: Krispy Kreme Rewards: Free Doughnut
description: Download the Krispy Kreme Rewards app and get a free original glazed doughnut on sign-up.
description_zh: 下载 Krispy Kreme Rewards 应用，注册即可领取一只免费原味糖霜甜甜圈。

title: The Body Shop Love Your Body Club: £5 Birthday Reward
title_zh: The Body Shop 会员俱乐部：生日 £5 礼遇
description: Join the Love Your Body Club to receive a £5 voucher on your birthday plus exclusive member offers.
description_zh: 加入 Love Your Body Club，生日当月可获得 £5 代金券并享受会员专属优惠。
